item.description:
Join us for a relaxing afternoon at the beautiful and eclectic Peabody Essex Museum in Salem. This museum is home to maritime collections, textile collections, Asian art, contemporary art, historical art, interactive exhibits, and more.

http://pem.org/

We'll meet at the main admission desk, and begin to work our way around the museum at 2:30pm.  The museum admission is $15.00.  Check your local library for the availability of museum passes for discounted admission prices.

The museum closes at 5:00pm, after which time we can start walking over to the Hawthorne Hotel.  We can have a drink or two in the Tavern before we sit down to share a meal in the very wonderful Nathaniel's.  Nanthaniel offers old-fashioned and contemporary menus as well as full and demi portions.  I will plan on a 6:00pm reservation.

http://www.hawthornehotel.com/Dining#Nathaniel
item.how_to_find_us: We can gather at the Admissions desk. I will try to arrive 15 minutes early to greet our guests.

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Peabody Essex Museum, Drinks, Dinner at Nathaniel's
